about_the_game:
Discover the story of Isur, a Tiir (a creature similar to slimes) who lives in the Dark Forest. When his best friend Valt is captured by humans, Isur must seek the wisdom of the village elder. However, before he can do so, he is intercepted by a mysterious human who grants him a power beyond his understanding. Now, his mission is to find other Tiir scattered across the world to gain the strength and abilities necessary to rescue Valt and bring him to a new sanctuary for their species.

What are the Tiir?

The Tiir are soft, round, and transparent masses that are very curious about everything around them. Despite their appearance, they are very sturdy and have lived for hundreds of years.

The Tiir do not require food to survive, but they love to eat anything smaller than themselves. Over time, they can acquire the coloration and properties of the food they consume. Due to their abilities, these creatures are often hunted by humans for potion-making.

Features

• Tiir Request is a retro RPG game.

• Turn-based combat

• In-game achievements

• 15+ places to explore

• You will need your skills to make your way and find all the Tiir

• Be careful with humans; touching one could start a battle.

• Look for the bright light to save your game.

Warning

• This game is only available in Spanish.

• The story of this game is part of the world of Angel Request, the book.

short_description: Tiir Request is a retro like RPG adventure where you will meet the Tiir, a kind of-slimy creature that lives on this fantasy world known as Patnor. During the adventure, you will be controlling Isur, a ditzy Tiir that will carve the future of his specie with his simple yet deep decisions.
